summary:
Modify two-handed weapon is More strongly than original two-handed weapon.

addition : Two-handBackstab, SkillfulArms

modify : Elemental Protection, Warmaster, ParalyzingStrike
descriptionHtml:
Two-handBackstab
Sneak attacks with Two-handed weapons now do four times damage


Elemental Protection
Blocking reduces incoming fire, frost and shock damage


ParalyzingStrike
Power attack has a 7% chance to paralyze the target and Backwards power attacks have a 40% chance to paralyze the target


Warmaster
Power attack has a 20% chance to paralyze the target and Backwards power attack has a 60% chance to paralyze the target


SkillfulArms
Power attacks do 15% bonus damage with Two-handed weapons cost 15% less stamina. and Power attack is 25% faster


Barbarian
Two-handed weapons do 40% more damage.
Two-handed weapons do 80% more damage.
Two-handed weapons do 120% more damage.
Two-handed weapons do 160% more damage.
Two-Handed weapons do Tripled as much damage.
author: pig87
